entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
